code: import Easing from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Easing";export var TransitionIOSSpec={animation:'spring',config:{stiffness:1000,damping:500,mass:3,overshootClamping:true,restDisplacementThreshold:10,restSpeedThreshold:10}};export var FadeInFromBottomAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:350,easing:Easing.out(Easing.poly(5))}};export var FadeOutToBottomAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:150,easing:Easing.in(Easing.linear)}};export var RevealFromBottomAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:425,easing:Easing.bezier(0.35,0.45,0,1)}};export var ScaleFromCenterAndroidSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:400,easing:Easing.bezier(0.35,0.45,0,1)}};export var BottomSheetSlideInSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:250,easing:function easing(t){return Math.cos((t+1)*Math.PI)/2.0+0.5;}}};export var BottomSheetSlideOutSpec={animation:'timing',config:{duration:200,easing:function easing(t){return t===1.0?1:Math.pow(t,2);}}};
